attributes.action: To debate a vote of no confidence in the Conservative Party running the country
attributes.additional_details:
I put it to the public that this government is so hopelessly out of touch with reality, that it shouldn't be in any position of power. 

500 characters is nowhere near enough to articulate why this is so, but consider the following:

Tax avoidance from big business costs the state £70M a year - yet corporation and inheritance tax has been slashed. 

We are then expected to believe it's the neediest in society that has to pick up the pieces. This is a travesty beyond all comprehension.
attributes.background:
This government is nasty, regressive and punitive. 

Over half of the people in this country didn't vote for them - this is not fair or proportional representation of the electorate. 

Millions will suffer due to this ideological austerity mantra and it must be stopped.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104544

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
